name: xtools-xagent
title: XTools gadget (XAgent)
description: Checks visited pages on-the-fly (~ 1 sec) for syntax-, grammar-, broken-link-problems and missing Wikidata properties. In addition, Agent for your cross-wiki Echo notifications.
keywords: gadget, javascript, xagent, xtools, i18n, multilingual, cross-wiki
author: Hedonil
